allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive project documentation to README

- Document application purpose and features
- List complete tech stack \(Next.js, React, TypeScript, Supabase\)
- Detail project structure with all directories and files
- Include installation and setup instructions
- Document database schema and table structure
- List all pages/routes with descriptions
- Explain health calculation formulas and constants
- Add deployment instructions for Vercel

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
